remarks: Lemma for ~ isfin3-2 .  Non-minimum implies that there is always another decrease.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Nov-2014.)
statement:
isf32lem.a $e |- ( ph -> F : _om --> ~P G ) $.
isf32lem.b $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. _om ( F ` suc x ) C_ ( F ` x ) ) $.
isf32lem.c $e |- ( ph -> -. |^| ran F e. ran F ) $.
isf32lem2 $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. _om ) -> E. a e. _om ( A e. a /\ ( F ` suc a ) C. ( F ` a ) ) ) $.
$d A a x $.
$d F a x $.
$d G a $.
$d a ph x $.
